title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) + geom_point(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy))
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) + geom_bar(mapping=aes(x=displ))
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) + geom_col(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy))
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) + geom_col(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,fill=class))
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) + geom_boxplot(mapping=aes(x=class,y=hwy))
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) + geom_text(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy,label=class),check_overlap = T)
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) + geom_jitter(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy))
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) + geom_smooth(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy))
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) + geom_smooth(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy),method="lm")
```

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) + geom_smooth(mapping=aes(x=displ,y=hwy),method="gam")
```
